title: Isolation
text: First we should isolate the variable on one side of the equation by adding, subtracting, multiplying or dividing the equation.

title: Subtraction
text: What is the result after subtracting 7 from both sides?

title: Normalization
text: When the variable is multiplied by a coefficient in the final stage, multiply both sides of the equation by the reciprocal of the cofficient.

title: Multiplication
text: What is the result after multiplying both sides by $$\frac{1}{2}$$?
